shortDescription: Prime Minister Parata's defection from the Directorate can only be achieved if we secure his family members currently being held hostage under Victoria's orders. Once the Restoration frees them, Henare Parata have given personal assurances that his forces will either stand down or at least become neutral in the fight between Houses Arano and Espinosa. It is critical that we rescue his family members before we can move against Lady Victoria and the Directorate leadership.
longDescription: Since we have been unable to contact Colonel Haust since the initial landing, we have no intel on the Espinosa forces, so we'll be dropping into the dark here.

contractObjectiveList.title: Attempt to Rescue Lady Georgia Parata

dialogueContent.words: The Royal Guard is on the field. All 'Mechs report operational and ready. Good work Chief Virtanen.
Thanks Captain, I will pass on your compliments to the Mech Techs.
Kamea, according to Henare this is the last known location of House Parata's family members.
How likely is it that they are still there?
The Prime Minister has kept a watch on the location but we can't confirm it if the hostages are still there.
Nor can I really trust Henare's word. Royal Guard, let's approach with caution.
And now we will see if exchanging House Parata for Colonel Haust was worth it.
The Prime Minister keeps hailing us from the surface.
All targets eliminated. Sit tight, and I can collect you from where you are at right now.
And now we will see if exchanging House Parata for Colonel Haust was worth it.
The Prime Minister keeps hailing us from the surface.
New sensor contacts! I've got hostile units converging on your location!
Damn you, Victoria! Taking hostages is a coward's move. If you wanted to fight me, you should've come yourself!
I was expecting your filthy Mercs to attempt rescuing Lady Georgia... I can't wait for our reunion, cousin.
You won't have to wait for long, Victoria.
Lady Kamea, are you there? This is Colonel Haust.
Colonel, were are you? We have been waiting for your signal since we landed.
It was only until the ambush that I was able to slip away from the Citadel. You need to capture me.
Not bad, cousin… but I'm not finished with you yet.
That's the last one. Royal Guard, let's move to secure the hostages.
Argo, this place has been emptied, there's no one here.
Understood Guard One, Dr. Murad please run another sweep...
And you actually came to save Lady Georgia, cousin. How adorable of you and a missed opportunity to take you down myself.
Victoria, where are his family members? What have you done with them.
Nothing for now cousin, I wasn't sure of House Parata's loyalties until you decided to rescue them.
But don't worry, I'll deal with them the same I did with Karosas and the other betrayers. Now you die!
Lady Arano, the Prime Minister is demanding details about his family.
We don't know yet! Tell him to wait!
Captain, we're receiving a new transmission... patching it through.
Welcome to Tyrlon, Lady Arano. I apologize I couldn't contact you until now.
Colonel Haust, your absence has been noted. Where are you now?
Watching you and your Royal Guards from where I've been commanding this ambush.
What? That was not what we had agreed upon, Colonel|
Lady Arano, I proposed the ambush to Lady Victoria as a way to leave the Citadel, otherwise I couldn't contact you safely.
I see and what are your intentions now?
You need to personally extract me at this safe location. But there's still another loyalist lance in the area and Lady Victoria will soon realize something is wrong.
And in exchange?
The key to your throne. See you soon, Lady Arano.
Colonel Haust, we are at the designated coordinates, where are you?
We have the Colonel. Pilot Meyer, get us a extraction zone now|
Roger that, Captain.
Lady Victoria has kept this DropShip as a final surprise.
Why hasn't she escaped Tyrlon on it?
Pride Lady Arano, and some rather flawed intelligence on my part.
